definition: ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc

sentences.english: He rode on, blood flowing from his side.
sentences.chinese: 他騎滅馬，陳血從腰部流上去。

sentences.english: Chronic pain stimulus of lumbar and perineum regions would cause sexual disorder.
sentences.chinese: 腰部及會陰區的慢性疼痛刺激可導致性功能障礙。

sentences.english: Pajama pants feature a drawstring waist tie for an easy, adjustable fit.
sentences.chinese: 睡褲功能束帶腰部綁了一個簡單的，可調適合。

sentences.english: The backrest has built in lumbar support.
sentences.chinese: 在已建成的靠背腰部支撐。

sentences.english: In the car accident he lost feeling below the waist.
sentences.chinese: 這次車禍使他腰部底下全無知覺。

sentences.english: Snap, hook & loop and zipper waist with adjusters.
sentences.chinese: 管理單元，鉤和調節器的循環與拉鍊腰部。

sentences.english: They have a short, broad head and heavily muscled loins and haunches.
sentences.chinese: 他們有短，寬頭和腰部肌肉嚴重和臀部。

sentences.english: The bag is then unhooked or rolled up around the waist.
sentences.chinese: 這個袋子然後被解開或者捲起繞在腰部。

sentences.english: The blouse Niu that unties her buttons up, will her sleep the position that the skirt pulls Gao Dao's loins.
sentences.chinese: 解開她的上衣鈕釦，將她的睡裙拉高到腰部的位置。

sentences.english: Epaulettes, belted waist and cuffs, central back vent.
sentences.chinese: 肩飾，腰部和袖口束帶，背部開褶中心透氣位。

sentences.english: Excessively long back, especially when coupled with weak loin connection.
sentences.chinese: 過長的背部，腰部尤其是弱連接耦合。

sentences.english: The dress fitted badly and puckered at the waist.
sentences.chinese: 這件連衣裙不稱身，腰部很皺。

sentences.english: Collection exercise the muscles on both sides of the waist, can play a role in thin waist.
sentences.chinese: 集合鍛鍊腰部兩側的肌肉，可以起到瘦腰的作用。

sentences.english: She has high nose, jet-black straight hair hang down her waist.
sentences.chinese: 她高鼻樑，烏黑的直髮垂下她的腰部。

sentences.english: Standard-rise belted waist with a finished curtain waistband.
sentences.chinese: 標準束帶腰部上升，成品窗簾腰帶。

sentences.english: After that, it is pilates meant for the abdominals and lower back muscles.
sentences.chinese: 之後，它的意思是普拉提的腹部和腰部肌肉。

definition: back (of a human or other vertebrate, or of an object)
lower half of one's body/Lower Body (Chinese poetry movement of the early 21st century)
